_comments: Applet that sends a Notification when an all-day calendar event is added to Google Calendar

body.scriptCode: var trigger_starts = GoogleCalendar.newEventAdded.Starts; var trigger_ends = GoogleCalendar.newEventAdded.Ends; var trigger_title = GoogleCalendar.newEventAdded.Title; var wheresAt = trigger_starts.search(' at '); var startDate = ''; var endDate = ''; var startTime = ''; var endTime = ''; var fullStartTime = ''; var fullEndTime = ''; if (wheresAt == -1) { startDate = new Date(trigger_starts); startTime = 'not found'; endDate = new Date(trigger_ends); endTime = 'not found'; } else { var startArray = trigger_starts.split(' at '); startDate = new Date(startArray[0]); startTime = startArray[1]; var endArray = trigger_ends.split(' at '); endDate = new Date(endArray[0]); endTime = endArray[1]; } var diffInMs = endDate.getTime() - startDate.getTime(); var msPerDay = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24; var diffInDays = diffInMs / msPerDay; if (wheresAt == -1) { if (diffInDays != 1) { IfNotifications.sendNotification.setMessage('Calendar: ' + diffInDays + '-day event added. It starts ' + trigger_starts + ' and is titled "' + trigger_title + '".'); } } else { if (diffInDays == 1 && startTime == endTime) { IfNotifications.sendNotification.setMessage('Calendar: 24-hour event added that starts ' + trigger_starts + ', ends ' + trigger_ends + ', and is titled "' + trigger_title + '".'); } else { if (startTime.search('PM') == -1) { fullStartTime = new Date(startArray[0] + ' ' + startTime.substr(0,5) + ' AM'); } else { fullStartTime = new Date(startArray[0] + ' ' + startTime.substr(0,5) + ' PM'); } if (endTime.search('PM') == -1) { fullEndTime = new Date(endArray[0] + ' ' + endTime.substr(0,5) + ' AM'); } else { fullEndTime = new Date(endArray[0] + ' ' + endTime.substr(0,5) + ' PM'); } var fullDiffInMs = fullEndTime.getTime() - fullStartTime.getTime(); var msPerMin = 1000 * 60; var diffInMin = fullDiffInMs / msPerMin; var minPerDay = 60 * 24; if (diffInMin < minPerDay) { skip('IfNotifications.sendNotification'); } else { IfNotifications.sendNotification.setMessage('Calendar: 24+ hour event added that starts ' + trigger_starts + ', ends ' + trigger_ends + ', and is titled "' + trigger_title + '".'); } } }
